name: Ravi Madhusudhan
position: Chief Technologist, Teqbahn Labs, Teqit, Raven AI
message:
Udara brings great App development and problem solving experience with good communication skills that assisted us in integrating a web based user experience within their App platform domain.

A great team player on any team!

name: Hashan Madhuranga
message: Udara is a student who has done a good job since the beginning of his education. He is a person who is able to perform all the tasks assigned to him before the due date and in order. He is also a responsible person. he has the ability to work well with team. I personally know that he does his job well within the organization as well.
